title: Mr. Putter & Tabby See the Stars
description: After Mr. Putter eats exactly twenty-one of Mrs. Teaberry's delicious pineapple jelly rolls, he ends up with a grumbling tummy--and a bad case of insomnia! A midnight stargazing stroll with Tabby seems to be just the cure. But could it be that Mr. Putter and Tabby aren't the only ones still wide awake?Take a wondrous nighttime stroll with good friends in this sixteenth fun adventure in the Mr. Putter & Tabby series.
author: Cynthia Rylant
